text: Haim Gouri (; October 9, 1923 â€“ January 31, 2018) was an Israeli poet, novelist, journalist, and documentary filmmaker. He was born in Tel Aviv.Eli Elihau, First-person plural, Haaretz April 17, 2009. In 1975, he won the Bialik Prize for literature and in 1988, he won the Israel Prize for Hebrew poetry.Encyclopedia of Holocaust Literature: Haim Gouri Gouri died in Jerusalem on January 31, 2018 at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Israeli screenwriters Category:Israeli poets Category:Israeli novelists Category:Israeli journalists Category:Movie directors from Tel Aviv Category:Writers from Tel Aviv
